title: A Late Return - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Martial Arts   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Ancient China   Death of Loved Ones   Oneshot   Wars   Younger Love Interests
author: Lu Tianyi   吕天逸
description:
Midnight. 

A slow elegiac song enveloped the cold night. 

Ye Wenshui stood beneath a flowering tree with his hands clasped behind his back. The light of the moon and stars shone on his clear face, further illuminating his porcelain-like purity. 

The sound of heavy military boots came from not too far away as the flowers upon the ground were crushed underfoot. >
